cv:
Collin Crooks New Delhi, Delhi - Email me on Indeed: Johnston.Laverne@heap.name
WORK EXPERIENCE
Software Developer
ION Trading -
June 2016 to Present
As part of ION Trading, I have been working as a core product developer on a Repurchase Agreements(REPO) Trading Solution, called Anvil 9 Trading Solution. Currently I am working on Order Management System, which is a component/service that enable the traders to capture orders from emails and chats. I have also worked on Apache CoreNLP to leverage its Named Entity Recognition feature to extracting business keywords from a given text.
Intern
Microsoft - Hyderabad, Telangana -
June 2015 to August 2015
I was part of the Microsoft Service Global Delivery Internship for two months in Hyderabad. On my internship, I got an opportunity to develop a Windows 10 application.
